docs.snippet: NEW YORK. How much censorship exists  in the world today? What gains or losses were made in the last year in the never-ending efforts to keep people informed of what goes on? Every year at this period the Associated Press asks its correspondents...
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW YORK. How much censorship exists in the world today? What gains or losses were made in the last year in the never-ending efforts to keep people informed of what goes on? Every year at this period the Associated Press asks its correspondents around the world to report on current conditions.
